body_html:
I have the same error when using "from tensorflow.contrib.cudnn_rnn import CudnnGRU"

ImportError: /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so: undefined symbol: cudnnConvolutionBiasActivationForward

And I tried to reinstall tensorflow-gpu with git but failed.

My version of python is 3.5
My system is ubuntu 16.04

body:
I have the same error when using "from tensorflow.contrib.cudnn_rnn import CudnnGRU"

ImportError: /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow_internal.so: undefined symbol: cudnnConvolutionBiasActivationForward

And I tried to reinstall tensorflow-gpu with git but failed.

My version of python is 3.5
My system is ubuntu 16.04
